== Installer == 

- $HOME/.profile loads:
  - $DOTFILES/environment/bash/profile
- $PATH variable:
  - starts with $DOTFILES/environment/bin/
- $HOME/.vimrc loads:
  - $DOTFILES/environment/config/vim/main.vim 
  - $DOTFILES/environment/config/vim/plugins.vim
- $HOME/.tmux.conf loads:
  - $DOTFILES/environment/config/tmux/tmux.conf
- neovim uses sources $HOME/.vimrc
